summary: Create a website for St Martin School.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- School crest/logo in a classic academic style with a green-and-cream palette (st-martin-crest.dim_512x512.png)
- Homepage hero illustration of a welcoming school building/campus in a warm, classic academic style (st-martin-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Seamless subtle background pattern (e.g., shield/leaf motifs) in light cream/green (st-martin-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page school website for “St Martin School” with a top navigation and footer, including these pages/sections: Home, About, Academics, Admissions, News & Events, Contact.

Implement Home page content blocks suitable for a school website: hero section (headline + short description + primary call-to-action), 3–4 highlights (e.g., Academic Excellence, Student Life, Values, Community), and a preview strip for upcoming events/news.
Create About page content structure with placeholders: school overview, mission & values, leadership/staff teaser, and a simple timeline or milestones section.
Create Academics page content structure with placeholders: grade levels (or departments), curriculum overview, extracurriculars/clubs, and facilities/resources.
Create Admissions page content structure with placeholders: how to apply steps, requirements, tuition/fees placeholder (optional), and FAQ accordion.
Create News & Events page that lists sample news posts and events (static seed data on the frontend), with a simple filter toggle (All / News / Events) and detail view or expandable cards.

Implement a Contact page with a form (name, email, subject, message) that submits to the backend and shows success/error states; also show school contact info placeholders (address, phone, email, office hours).

Establish a coherent visual theme for St Martin School and apply it consistently across pages (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards). Choose a classic, academic look using warm neutrals and deep greens (avoid blue/purple).

Add generated image assets (logo/crest and homepage hero illustration) to the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the layout (header branding and homepage hero).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website for St Martin School.

Add a backend data model for storing contact form submissions (name, email, subject, message, createdAt) and expose methods to create a submission and optionally list recent submissions for debugging/admin use (no public UI required for listing).
